rules.description: Configuration for the rule list which stores the rule information in-memory and executed by rule engine service.

property.name: content
property.value: 客户身份证号码命中内部黑名单

property.name: exe_sql
property.value: select count(1) from customer_black_list inner join user_basicinfo on user_basicinfo.CERTIFICATE_NUMBER = customer_black_list.certificate_no where customer_black_list.certificate_type >=1 and user_basicinfo.customer_no = ? and customer_black_list.is_black = 1
